cast.overview: In 19th century France, Jean Valjean, a man imprisoned for stealing bread, must flee a relentless policeman named Javert. The pursuit consumes both men's lives, and soon Valjean finds himself in the midst of the student revolutions in France.
cast.title: Les Misérables

details.biography: Benjamin Lorton Crompton (born 1974) is an English actor and standup comedian. He's best known for his role as Eddison Tollett on HBO's Game of Thrones, and as Colin on the BBC Three sitcom Ideal, as well as his performance on the BBC sketch show Man Stroke Woman.
details.name: Ben Crompton
